sentences.en: He pulled his holdall straight to the door to the lift.
sentences.cn: 他把他的旅行袋一直拖到电梯门口.

sentences.en: He shivered, humping his canvas holdall higher onto his shoulder.
sentences.cn: 他打着哆嗦，把帆布包往肩上又挪了挪。

trans.tran_en: a large bag used for carrying clothes and other things when you are travelling
